name: Brewstone
description:
Brewstone is a third-person adventure game where you play as a robot, brewing potions to curl at ghosts. A Game created for the University of Portsmouth 2020 Game Jam

Kian - Programmer and 3D animator

Emily - 3D environment artist and 2D art

Vic - 3D character and environment artist

Elliot - Programmer and 2D art

3rd Party Assets

  • https://www.1001fonts.com/deanna-font.html
  • https://www.1001fonts.com/feast-of-flesh-bb-font.html
  • https://opengameart.org/content/factory-ambiance
  • https://opengameart.org/content/haunted-woods-horror-drone
  • https://opengameart.org/content/paralysis
  • https://opengameart.org/content/steam-release-sounds
  • https://www.zapsplat.com/music/cartoon-punch-1/
